statements: SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, creation_date FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, email, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 5000;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_accounts WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND creation_date < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_accounts, AVG(account_balance) AS avg_balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, password_hash FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT application_id, user_id, loan_amount, status FROM loan_applications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT username, email, loan_amount, status FROM user_accounts JOIN loan_applications ON user_accounts.user_id = loan_applications.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Eve') OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email, creation_date FROM users ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, amount, interest_rate, start_date FROM loans WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT user_id, loan_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, creation_date FROM users ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE status = 'approved' AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, l.amount AS loan_amount FROM transactions t JOIN loans l ON t.loan_id = l.loan_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id GROUP BY user_id, first_name, last_name;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT users.first_name, loans.loan_amount FROM users JOIN loans ON users.user_id = loans.user_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM collateral WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT amount, interest_rate, status FROM loans WHERE loan_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, collateral_type, value FROM collateral WHERE value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE status = 'approved' AND interest_rate > 3.5 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, l.amount, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN loans l ON t.loan_id = l.loan_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'payment';
SELECT c.collateral_type, u.username, c.value FROM collateral c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.value > 100000 ORDER BY c.value ASC, u.username DESC;
